content.html: Can you create an automated API check that asserts the body of an HTTP response in 99 minutes? Join @2bittester for our first ever 99 Minute Challenge on Wednesday at 8pm GMT in which we'll learn how to solve this challenge as a community. buff.ly/3rXJnYX
content.value:
Can you create an automated API check that asserts the body of an HTTP response in 99 minutes?

Join @2bittester for our first ever 99 Minute Challenge on Wednesday at 8pm GMT in which we'll learn how to solve this challenge as a community.

buff.ly/3rXJnYX

photo.alt: Picture of a mountain and a clock with the text 99 Minute Challenges
